Scripts.Name: MFARunner-Emailer
Scripts.Description: The emailer handles sending out emails

Scripts.Name: MFARunner-Main
Scripts.Description: This is the main logic loop

Scripts.Name: MFARunner-CalendlyEventFinder
Scripts.Description: This hooks calendly appointments to find out which event is the right one

Variables.Name: tempCalendlyHits
Variables.Description: Used to store hits on the temporary webhook

Variables.Name: calendlyAcceptableEvent
Variables.Description: Should be a https://api.calendly.com/event_types/* url, this event will be the only one accepted by the calendly hook

Variables.Name: calendlyApiKey
Variables.Description: This is the calendly API Key, it is required for the tool to function properly.

Variables.Name: emailerEnabled
Variables.Description: This enable / disables the automatic emailing. It is false by default

Variables.Name: EmailTemplateBase
Variables.Description: This is your base email template, it needs to be UTF-8 encoded and contains both {{$DisplayName}} and {{$CutoffDate}} to work properly.

Variables.Name: EnableMFACutoff
Variables.Description: Enables/Disable automatic MFA enablement after a set value of time.

Variables.Name: Partners
Variables.Description: This is where all parnters are held

Variables.Name: Statistics
Variables.Description: This is where MFA enrollment statistics are held

Variables.Name: Users
Variables.Description: This is where user-specific data is held

Variables.Name: emailSmtpServer
Variables.Description: This is your email SMTP server

Variables.Name: emailFrom
Variables.Description: This is the from value where automatic email come from

Variables.Name: emailServerPort
Variables.Description: The port for the email server

Variables.Name: emailServerUseSSL
Variables.Description: Should the email server use SSL

Variables.Name: MFACutoffDelay
Variables.Description: How many days to wait before force-enabling MFA

Credentials.Name: MSPartnerCreds
Credentials.Title: MS Partner Account Creds
Credentials.Description: Those credentials need to have access to all tenants.
